meanings.definition: Tease or make fun of someone in a playful or mocking way.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the kids were razzing each other about who could run the fastest.
meanings.sent2: Friends often enjoy razzing each other in a friendly manner.
meanings.sent3: The siblings were razzing each other about who could eat the most cookies.
meanings.sent4: His friends were razzing him so much that he felt like a comedian on stage.
meanings.sent5: The razzing at the party made everyone laugh and have a good time.

meanings.definition: The act of teasing or making fun of someone.
meanings.sent1: After the game, there was a lot of razzing among the players in the locker room.
meanings.sent2: Razzing can sometimes be a way for friends to bond and show affection.
meanings.sent3: The razzing between the siblings was all in good fun.
meanings.sent4: The razzing in the office was like a daily dose of humor.
meanings.sent5: The loud razzing from the audience made the comedian feel appreciated.
